thread.section_title: pentahotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good price, attractive design
thread.title_full: Good price, attractive design - Review of pentahotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Tim B
title: Good price, attractive design
text: As I'm a guy from Western Europe I'm quite spoiled when it comes to well designed coffee bars and hotels that are not high brow but welcoming. Pentahotel gave me exactly that feeling when I walked in: lots of wooden and glass elements, dimmed lighting, nice furniture and cosy little spaces. Staff spoke basic English, the noodle bar offered simple but good food and the bar and breakfast area was perfect. Breakfast itself wasn't very elaborate but for me it offered enough variety nevertheless. I loved the room! Perfect in terms of spaciousness, design, cleanliness and comfort!
